indexterm.primary: build needed infrastructure to create cdsls

refnamediv.refpurpose: Builds needed infrastructure to create cdsls.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Builds needed infrastructure to create cdsls, this contains creating directories and symbolic links. Does not include mounting of needed bindmounts. Uses a inventoryfile to get needed values. If inventoryfile does not exist, create it by using predefined defaultvalues and/or values which are specified via parameters. When using a existing inventoryfile, it does take no more effect to pass parameters which could be content of a inventoryfile. These values would be ignored.

If a cdsl-inventoryfile is created, it does only contain a defaultsection which does contain important values for later cdsl-operations. This tools does not add informations about maybe existing cdsls.

refsect1.title: Options
refsect1.para: The available options are equal to these of the old com_create_cdsl script.

listitem.para: Extends output by adding debugging messages
Path for cdsl link (default: /cdsl.local)
If set, execution will be only simulated
Path to mountpoint to use (default: None)
Shows a short help
Path for shared cdsltree (default: cluster/shared)
Use defaultvalues to create infrastructure/inventoryfile. Only needed when no other parameter is used for avoiding that only help is showed.
Set default directory (default: None)
Outputs version
Set maxnodeidnum (default: 0)
Reduces output to critical messages (supress debug and info messages)
Does only create Inventoryfile without building infrastructure
Path for hostdependent (default: cluster/cdsl)
Set nodeprefix (default: None)
Specify the path to clusterconfiguration (default: /etc/cluster/cluster.conf)
Specify the path to inventoryfile to create/use (default: /var/lib/cdsl/cdsl_inventory.xml)
Set chroot-path (default: None)
Set to use nodeids

informalexample.para: Creates a inventoryfile and build the infrastructure needed for creating cdsls. Needs /etc/cluster/cluster.conf. Uses parameters from /var/lib/cdsl/cdsl_inventory.xml, if file is not already existing create it and use defaultvalues.
Same as example above, but skips creating of infrastructure. Does nothing if inventoryfile at /var/lib/cdsl/cdsl_inventory.xml already exists.

Creates a inventoryfile and build the infrastructure needed for creating cdsls. Needs /etc/cluster/cluster.conf. Only use this if /my_inventory.xml does not already exists! Creates inventoryfile by considering given values (use_nodeids, nodePrefix: node_, inventoryfile: /my_inventory.xml), consider values when building infrastructure. Show debugging output because -d is set.

refsect1.title: Files
refsect1.para: The above files are distributed and installed by the com-cdsl-py package.

refsect1.title: Author
refsect1.para: This manual page was written by Andrea Offermann andrea2@atix.de. refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Builds cdsls, this contains creating and copying of files and directories and building symbolic links. Needs a working cdsl-infrastructure an matching inventoryfile. Could create hostdependent and shared cdsls.

listitem.para: Reduces output to critical messages (supress debug and info messages)
Specify the path to inventoryfile to create/use (default: /var/lib/cdsl/cdsl_inventory.xml)
Overwrites existing links, files and directories. Skip backup.
Create a hostdependent cdsl.
Simulation mode. Display what would be done, but does not change filesystem.
Create a shared cdsl.
Specify the path to clusterconfiguration (default: /etc/cluster/cluster.conf)
Outputs version

updates inventoryfile: Add entry if cdsl with given target does not exist in inventoryfile but on filesystem, delete entry if cdsl does not exist on filesystem but in inventoryfile, update entry if it exists in inventoryfile but verifies from filesystem
Extends output by adding debugging messages
Sets chroot to create a Cdsl which should be used in a chroot-Environment
Shows a short help

informalexample.para: Check if /my_dir/my_file does appear in inventoryfile and if it exists on filesystem. Delete, add or update entry in inventoryfile, depending on if cdsl does already exist in inventoryfile and if cdsl exists on filesystem.
Creates a shared cdsl /my_dir/my_file. If file does not already exist, create it. Show debugging output. Use Inventoryfile at /my_inventory.xml

refsect1.title: Files
refsect1.para: The above files are distributed and installed by the com-cdsl-py package.

refsect1.title: Author
refsect1.para: This manual page was written by Andrea Offermann andrea2@atix.de. Permission is granted to copy, distribute and/or modify this document under the terms of the GNU Free Documentation License, Version 1.1 or any later version published by the Free Software Foundation; with no Invariant Sections, no Front-Cover Texts and no Back-Cover Texts.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Binary to check if cdsls which are defined in inventoryfile really exists in filesystem. Outputs a message if check was succesfull or not. In case of failure the tool documents which of the tested cdsls has failed in the logfile.

listitem.para: Specify the path to used logfile (default: /var/adm/cdsl_check_list)
Extends output by adding debugging messages
Use defaultvalues to perform inventorycheck. Parameter is only needed to proceed when no other parameter is given. Needed to avoid showing help-text when nothing else is specified.
Outputs version
Specify the path to inventoryfile to create/use (default: /var/lib/cdsl/cdsl_inventory.xml)
Sets chroot to check cdsls which where created to be used in a chroot-Environment
Shows a short help

informalexample.para: Uses default values for inventory- and logfile and check cdsl defined in inventoryfile. Outputs debugging messages.
Checks if cdsl defined in inventoryfile /my_dir/my_inventory.xml exists on filesystem. In case of failure report these to logfile

refsect1.title: Files
refsect1.para: The above files are distributed and installed by the com-cdsl-py package.

refsect1.title: Author
refsect1.para: This manual page was written by Andrea Offermann andrea2@atix.de. Permission is granted to copy, distribute and/or modify this document under the terms of the GNU Free Documentation License, Version 1.1 or any later version published by the Free Software Foundation; with no Invariant Sections, no Front-Cover Texts and no Back-Cover Texts.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Uses information about root and mountpoint for cdsls, which need to be defined in an cdsl-inventoryfile, to search filesystem for cdsls. Does not search submounts. Adds founded cdsls to inventoryfile. Could be used to complete a cdsl-inventoryfile on a system where not all cdsls where created via com-mkcdsl. Needs a existing cdsl-inventoryfile.

listitem.para: Specify the path to used inventoryfile (default: /var/lib/cdsl/cdsl_inventory.xml)
Extends output by adding debugging messages
Use defaultvalues to perform cdsl-search. Only needed when no other parameters are given to avoid display of help text.
Minimizes output to critical messages
Specify the path to used clusterconfiguration (default: /etc/cluster/cluster.conf)
Outputs version
Sets chroot to search cdsls which where created to be used in a chroot-Environment
Shows a short help

informalexample.para: If no parameter is defined, search for cdsls in directory which is defined as cdsl_link in the inventoryfile.
Uses clusterconfiguration at /my_dir/my_config.xml and suppress all but critical messages.

refsect1.title: Files
refsect1.para: The above files are distributed and installed by the com-cdsl-py package.

refsect1.title: Author
refsect1.para: This manual page was written by Andrea Offermann andrea2@atix.de. Permission is granted to copy, distribute and/or modify this document under the terms of the GNU Free Documentation License, Version 1.1 or any later version published by the Free Software Foundation; with no Invariant Sections, no Front-Cover Texts and no Back-Cover Texts.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Deletes existing cdsl from filesystem and inventoryfile. Contains deleting of symbolic links and content of cdsl.

listitem.para: Specify the path to used inventoryfile (default: /var/lib/cdsl/cdsl_inventory.xml)
Simulates deletion by showing only the debug-messages of what would be done if noexecute is not set.
Minimizes output to critical messages
Specify the path to used clusterconfiguration (default: /etc/cluster/cluster.conf)
Outputs version
Extends output by adding debugging messages
Set root if you work in an environment where chroot is planed but not already performed. Set path to the value you plan to use for your chroot-environment.
Set to avoid deletion of cdsls content. If set only the symbolic links which where created with the cdsl are removed.
Shows a short help

informalexample.para: If only the path to the cdsl to delete is specified, delete symbolic links and content.
Use to show what changes would apply when perform com-rmcdsl, but only simulate its behaviour. Does not change any part of the cdsl-infrastructure.
Same as above, but delete only symbolic links. Helpfull if you want to delete a cdsl but need its content afterwards.

refsect1.title: Files
refsect1.para: The above files are distributed and installed by the com-cdsl-py package.
